conclusion: Connect the device to the liquid, ensuring that the liquid is at the desired temperature.
Measure the initial volume of the liquid in the container (C) before any solid is added.
Add the solid to the liquid in the container.
Measure the volume of the liquid in the container after the solid has been added.
Calculate the volume of the solid by subtracting the initial volume of the liquid from the final volume of the liquid.
Final volume of liquid is calculated as Volume of liquid in container + Volume of solid.
